chapter.text: I can tell that some of you are probably hanging onto every word. ^1500Analyzing every sentence. ^1500Probably rearranging it, too. ^1500It’s a fun back and forth, this thing we have. ^1500I always find it so interesting the things you leap to, and the information you’re able to find. ^1500I’ll be careful not to make anything too hard. ^1500That just wouldn't be fun. ^1500But you are fun to toy with from time to time.
